data_table.description: Hand Bone Lengths by X-ray, Original cohort: Baseline 1967 - 1969, Original cohort: Follow-up 1992 - 1993, Offspring cohort: Baseline 1993 - 1995, and Offspring cohort: Follow-up 2002 - 2003.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number
variable.coll_interval: Original cohort: Baseline 1967-1969 Original cohort: Follow-up 1992 - 1993 Offsp

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant identification number.
variable.coll_interval: Original cohort: Baseline 1967-1969 Original cohort: Follow-up 1992 - 1993 Offsp

variable.name: TabinID
variable.description: Internal study ID number associated with observation variables (order, observer, etc.)
variable.coll_interval: Original cohort: Baseline 1967-1969 Original cohort: Follow-up 1992 - 1993 Offsp
